p: The process for obtaining the oil was reproduced according to the Guarani-Kaiow√° indigenous method. The determination of the oil yield was based on the mean of three extractions. The mean oil content was 0.15 ml.g -1 of the larva. At the end of the RPLO extraction process, the oil was yellow and had an odor and viscosity characteristic of the oil processed at Takuara village. Thus, the experiments were continued.
